ComicInfo.Summary:
New Series Launch!
Grimm Fairy Tales is Back!
The world of humans has forever changed and the Grimm Universe has been shaken to its core. It started with the Age of Darkness and now with the death of Sela Mathers, earth's long time guardian, the Realms of Power have fallen into chaos. But Sela left behind one thing that may be able to save the world...her daughter, Skye. Don't miss this new chapter in Grimm Fairy Tales that takes the series back to its roots.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | David Finch & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Eric Basaldua & Ula Mos | 2 | C | Cover C | Greg Horn | 3 | D | Cover D | Talent Caldwell & Ivan Nunes | 4 | E | Cover E | Josh Burns | 5 | F | Diamond Foil Exclusive Cover, Limited to 1200 | Eric Basaldua & Ula Mos | Missing | G | Diamond Exclusive Cover, Limited to 1000 | David Finch & Ivan Nunes | 6 | H | Grimm Box Exclusive Cover, Limited to 400 | Sean Chen & Ula Mos | Missing | I | Zenescope Exclusive Cover, Limited to 250 | Eric Basaldua & Ula Mos | Missing | J | Blank Sketch Cover, Limited to 300 | None | Missing | K | Holiday Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Mike DeBalfo (a), Jeremy Clark (i) & Sanju Nivangune (c) | Missing | L | Holiday Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Mike DeBalfo (a), Jeremy Clark (i) & Sanju Nivangune (c) | Missing |
